1156270.name: Vital Signs: ED - Injuries Package #2
1156270.description:
Continue your career in Vital Signs: Emergency Department with this downloadable content pack. Focus solely on the nine newly added injury and poisoning cases by completing the Injuries Cases #2 scenario that comes with this pack, or encounter them during the course of a random shift.

New patients included with this Injuries Package #2:

  • 13yo M with Ankle Injury

  • 36yo M s/p motor cycle collision

  • 6yo M with Arm Pain

  • 15yo F with Nausea/Vomiting, possible ingestion

  • 45yo M s/p GSW to LLE, RUE, buttock

  • 8yo M with Arm Pain

  • 23yo F s/p fall from 15 foot balcony

  • 2yo M with Arm Pain

  • 18yo F with Ankle Injury
1156270.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
